tuv.seg: Skills training linked to national development
Scileanna traenála náscaithe le comhlucht náisiúnta

If you are interested in a career related to fisheries, food, hospitality, tourism, farming, forestry or crafts, you may find the course you are looking for amongst those offered by Government-funded agencies that specialise in that area

Má tá suim agat i slí beatha a bhaineann le iascaireacht, bia, fáiltíocht, turasóireacht, feirmeoireacht, foraoiseacht, nó céardaíocht, d'fheadfá an cúrsa atá á lorg agat a fháil i measc na gcúrsaí atá ar fáil ag eagraíochtaí maoinithe Rialtais seachas FÁS
Each of the agencies described below is directly linked to a particular commercial or industrial sector and has a range of state-funded full-time and part-time vocational courses on offer

Tá gach ceann de na heagraíochtaí atá liostáilte thíos ceangailte go díreach le rannóg áirithe tionsclaíochta nó tráchtála agus tá réimse de chúrsaí gairmeacha lánaimseartha agus páirtaimseartha á reachtáil acu
You need to check out each individual course with regard to details such as entry requirements and training allowances as they can be very different
Caithfidh tú gach cúrsa a sheiceáil i dtaobh mioneolas maidir le riachtanais iontrála agus liúntas traenála mar is féidir leis na cúrsaí a bheith an-difriúil óna chéile
Some agencies, for example, offer training courses at third level
Tairiscíonn cuid de na heagraíochtaí, mar shampla, cúrsaí traenála ag an triú leibhéal
These particular courses require you to have formal qualifications and to apply through the Central Applications Office as you would for any other third-level course
Caithfidh tú cáilíochtaí fhoirmiúla a bheith agat do na cúrsaí seo agus d'iarratas a dhéanamh tríd an Lár Oifig Iarratais mar an gcéanna is a dhéanfá le aon chúrsa triú leibhéal eile
Courses are offered by the following organisations:
Cúrsaí curtha ar fáil ag:
Fáilte Ireland is the National Tourism Development Authority of the island of Ireland
Is é Fáilte Éireann an tÚdarás Náisiúnta um Fhorbairt Turasóireachta
It is responsible for supporting the development of the Irish tourism industry
Tá sé freagrach as tacaíocht a thabhairt d’fhorbairt an tionscail turasóireachta in Éirinn
If you are interested in developing your skills in the tourism and hospitality sector, you can find the range of courses on the Fáilte Ireland website
Má tá spéis agat do scileanna san earnáil turasóireachta agus lóndadóireachta a fhorbairt, is féidir an réimse cursaí Fáilte Éireann ar líne a fheiceáil
Teagasc is Ireland's National Agriculture and Food Development Authority
Is é Teagasc an tÚdarás Náisiúnta Talmhaíochta agus Forbartha Bia
It provides a range of services, which include advice, research, education and training, to the agricultural and food industries
Cuireann sé réimse seirbhísí ar fáil, ina measc comhairle, taighde, oideachas agus traenáil, chuig tionscail na talmhaíochta agus an bhia
It provides third-level and vocational courses for young people in the areas of agriculture, horticulture, forestry, equine studies and many more
Cuireann Teagasc cúrsaí tríú leibhéil agus gairmiúla ar fáil do dhaoine óga atá ag dul le gairmeacha sa talmhaíocht, garraíodóireacht, fhoraoiseacht, staidéar eachaí agus níos mó

It provides adult farmer courses in financial management, environment and options outside of mainstream farming and also has training programmes for food industry personnel in food safety, quality, process and product development

agus deiseanna do theaghlaigh feirme, agus roghanna lasmuigh den fheirmeoireacht príomhshrutha. Soláthraíonn Teagasc traenáil do dhaoine atá ag obair i dtionscal an bhia maidir le sábháilteacht bhia, caighdeáin, próiseáil agus forbairt táirge
You can view the range of Teagasc courses online
Is féidir an réimse cursaí Teagasc ar líne a fheiceáil
Coillte is the agency in Ireland responsible for managing state forests and any related commercial activities
Tá bainistíocht choillte an Stáit faoi chúramCoillte chomh maith le aon ghnóthaí eacnamaíochta a bhaineann leo
Coillte works closely with those involved in timber production and provides services in Ireland in the areas of forestry, landscape and arboriculture
Bíonn Coillte ag obair as láimh a chéile le daoine a bhfuil baint acu le táirgeadh adhmaid agus cuireann an t-eagras seo seirbhísí foraoise, tírdhreacha agus crannadóireachta ar fáil
It is also involved in training, research engineering, forest nurseries, Christmas tree farms and the development of leisure facilities
Tá baint ag Coillte le traenáil, le hinnealtóireacht taighde, plandlanna crann, feirmeacha crainnte Nollag agus áiseanna siamsaíochta a fhorbairt chomh maith
Coillte training services provide a range of forestry industry training courses
Soláthraíonn na seirbhísí traenála de chuid Coillte réimse cursaí traenála i dtionscal na foraoise
Bord Iascaigh Mhara (The Irish Sea Fisheries Board) is the state agency for the development of the sea fishing and aquaculture industries
Is é Bord Iascaigh Mhara an ghníomhaireacht stáit i gcomhair fhorbairt thionscail na hiascaireachta mara agus an uisce-shaothraithe

If you are unemployed and interested in education and training in the fishing or aquaculture industry or if you are already working in these industries and would like to upgrade your skills, you may find a course to suit you among those offered by Bord Iascaigh Mhara. The courses include training in catching, fish farming (aquaculture) and seafood processing

Má bhíonn tú dífhostaithe agus go mbíonn suim agat san oideachas agus san oiliúint i dtionscal na n-iascach nó i dtionscal an uisceshaothraithe, nó go bhfuil tú ag obair sna tionscail sin cheana féin agus gur mhaith leat feabhas a chur le do scileanna, b'fhéidir go dtiocfá ar chúrsa feiliúnach duit i measc na gceann a thairgíonn Bord Iascaigh Mhara san áireamh: iascach, feirmeoireacht éisc (uisce-shaothrú), próiseáil an bhia mhara
The Crafts Council of Ireland
Comhairle Cheardaíochta na hÉireann
The Crafts Council of Ireland (CCoI) is the national organisation for the development of the craft industry in Ireland
Is í Comhairle Cheardaíochta na hÉireann (CCnÉ) an ghníomhaireacht náisiúnta in Éirinn do fhorbairt thionscal na ceardaíochtaí
It aims to develop the market for Irish craft at home and abroad and to encourage excellence in Irish design and making
Is iad na haidhmeanna atá acu ná margadh na gceardearraí Éireannacha a fhorbairt sa tír seo agus thar lear, agus an barrfheabhas a spreagadh sa dearadh agus sa déantúsaíocht Éireannach
CCoI runs craft-related training courses, provides information, mounts exhibitions and organises "Showcase", an annual trade fair held each January in the RDS in Dublin

Reachtálann CCnÉ cúrsaí oiliúna sa cheardaíocht, cuireann siad eolas ar fáil, cuireann siad taispeántais suas agus eagraíonn siad "Showcase" aonach bliantúil ceardaíochta a reachtáltar gach Eanáir sa R.D.S. i mBaile Átha Cliath é
